Package application

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
application.Utility
public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
Contains useful saving and loading mechanisms.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected static java.lang.String dirURL
    The directory the pet save file will be saved in.
    protected static java.io.File file
    Creates the save file Pet.txt to store pet save data.
    protected static boolean fileCreate
    Creates the directory for the save file.
    protected static java.lang.String fileURL
    The full address of the Pet.txt file that contains save data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Utility()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void clear()
    Erases all pet data in the Pet.txt file.
    static Pet loadPet()
    Loads the pet to the main class based off of the pet data in the Pet.txt file.
    static boolean readFile()
    Reads the file and determines if pet data is existing in Pet.txt.
    static void save()
    Saves the current pet data into the Pet.txt file.
    static void submission​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Submits the Pet to the Main class for display from the IntroWindow.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      The full address of the Pet.txt file that contains save data.

    • Utility

      public Utility()

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public static boolean readFile()
      Reads the file and determines if pet data is existing in Pet.txt.
      Returns:
      True if the save file has data, false if the save file does not have pet data.

    • save

      public static void save()
      Saves the current pet data into the Pet.txt file.

    • submission

      public static void submission​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Submits the Pet to the Main class for display from the IntroWindow.
      Parameters:
      stage - - The stage to display the pet on.

    • loadPet

      public static Pet loadPet()
      Loads the pet to the main class based off of the pet data in the Pet.txt file.
      Returns:
      the Pet to load into the main class.

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Erases all pet data in the Pet.txt file.
